alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:45PM AKDT until July 24 at 5:15PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Central Interior in Alaska... * Until 515 PM AKDT. * At 445 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 32 miles northwest of Murphy Dome, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Central Interior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
